data.name: Electro Ride: The Neon Racing
data.detailed_description:
WishList Our New Game

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1779610/Farm_Renovator/


check out other cool driving games our friends made:

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1020800?utm_source=ElectroRide/
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1267580?utm_source=ElectroRide/


About the Game

Become the fastest hero of the Neon-alternative Soviet Union!



  • Collect unique classic East Bloc cars
  • Collect the stars to change your neon’s color
  • Hit the stripes in your neon’s color
  • Use a race strategy and drive the Perfect Racing Line.
  • Reach the speeds your good ol’ Lada has never moved at
  • Unlock 20 racetracks in quick race and win 15 races in story mode. Try 20+ cars inspired by Eastern Bloc classics
  • Choose from many game modes including the beloved splitscreen - even Online
  • Race, fight and bounce to the Synthwave rhythms!
  • Take a beautiful pictures using ingame Photo Mode and share them with friends!
  • And a bonus: racing wheel support!





In an alternate Europe in which the Eastern Bloc did not fall, but transformed into a center of eternal wealth and progress - this is where fame awaits you. No ABS, no traction control, no modern electronic system. Only you and a beautiful, classic vehicle with super-powerful neon lights. Show your driving and drifting skills in such cars.



Think you’re a great racer? Get out of that Ferrari and stand for the real challenge: race with the crazy machines from the Eastern Bloc! No ABS, no traction control, no nothing. Just you and a beautiful, classic car with powerful neons. Show your tackling and drifting skills on 20 racetracks in quick race and 15 races in story mode. Try out 20+ cars inspired by the legends from:

  • USSR
  • Polish People's Republic
  • Czechoslovak Socialist Republic
  • People's Republic of Bulgaria
  • German Democratic Republic



The fame awaits. And you don’t do it for just yourself: you do it for the society. Enter the crazy neon racing world and become the hero of your neighborhood today!

data.short_description: Physics based Arcade Racer with neons, synthwave and Splitscreen. Become the fastest hero of the Neon-alternative Soviet Union on PVP Leaderboard. Collect unique classic East Bloc cars. Use the color-sensitive boosts strips and drive the Perfect Racing Line.
data.supported_languages: English, Polish, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Russian, Turkish, Portuguese, Traditional Chinese, Simplified Chinese

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Microsoft Windows 7/8/10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GT 9500 or AMD equivalen
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Soundcard
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Microsoft Windows 7/8/10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1060 or AMD equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Soundcard

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 10.13 High Sierra
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4000 or better
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 10.13 High Sierra
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 8000 Series or better
  • Storage: 8 GB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Linux Ubuntu 16.04 or newer
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 550 or AMD equivalen
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Linux Ubuntu 16.04 or newer
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 960 or AMD equivalent
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
